<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at Cern, in the county of Dorset, the 18 day of September 1623 at the visitation of the right reuerend father in God, the Lord Bishop of Bristoll by Robert Lougher pastor of Mapowder. Lougher, Robert.
[4], 35 p.
Printed by Iohn Legatt, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the White Lyon, in S. Pauls Church-yard, London : 1624.
Signatures: A² B-E⁴ F². Identified as STC 16828a on reel 715. Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
